Name: ApigeeX
Author: Nikhil Tripathi - v-ntripathi@microsoft.com
Description: The [Google ApigeeX](https://cloud.google.com/apigee/docs) data connector provides the capability to ingest ApigeeX audit logs into Azure Sentinel using the GCP Logging API. Refer to [GCP Logging API documentation](https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/reference/v2/rest) for more information.
